sense.name: a form that is perceptible and discerned as discrete
sense.examples: Use the test pattern on the computer monitor to calibrate the color values. She studied the speech patterns of speakers from rural Appalachia. John interpreted Mary's statement as a question because of the intonation pattern. The children described patterns they saw in ink blobs on paper. Small crystals of ice formed whorled patterns on the windowsill.

sense.name: customary, normative behavior or practices
sense.examples: The vet asked whether the cat had shown a change in dietary pattern. It was hard for them to break old working patterns after so many years. Economists have been tracking consumer spending patterns under rising inflation. He is a therapist who helps patients overcome dysfunctional behavioral patterns.

sense.name: a decorative design or motif
sense.examples: Mary didn't like the bold geometric patterns on the hotel carpet. John tried on a suit jacket with a herringbone pattern. Sally had trouble deciding on a wallpaper pattern for the dining room.

sense.name: a guiding model or design specification
sense.examples: This dress pattern is simple enough for beginning sewers. The American constitution has provided a pattern for other newer republics. No existing business models can provide a useful pattern for their innovative approach. The streets of the city were laid out on a pattern similar to those in Paris.

sense.name: a trend; re-occuring, related events
sense.examples: Police have noticed a pattern of violence in that neighborhood during the summer. Geneticists have found a hereditary pattern to this disease. The recent train bombings across Europe do not appear to have a pattern, analysts say. There is a new study on male pattern baldness. (hereditary trend)

sense.name: the prescribed route of aircraft through airspace
sense.examples: The planes were in a holding pattern over San Francisco until the fog lifted. The approach pattern at Logan Airport vectors planes across Boston Harbor.

sense.name: diagram showing spatial distribution of radiation from an antenna
sense.examples: This graph shows the radiation patterns in polar coordinates. What type of antenna would create this particular radiation pattern?
